modShortDescription: Traders seem OP? Need a world where you can not rely 100% on them? This mod increases their reset days to 7, changes how many items they carry and more.
modDescription:
Traders seem OP? Need a world where you can not rely 100 percent on them? This mod increases their reset days to 7, changes how many items they carry, changes how many items get swapped out, reduces items found in vending and increases vending reset days to 3.

[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_TraderBalances)

If you appreciate JaxTeller718’s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8098-jaxteller718-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
